website_summaries.verdict: You'll get your money's worth with the Sensate feature; however, the Solenoid may wear out over time.
pros: The sensor is located in an ideal spot, and the spray feature is in a fan shape to completely sweep the sink
cons: It runs on electricity rather than batteries, but you need to have a different electrical hookup than the disposal

customer_reviews.title: Great while it lasted (less than a year)
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a quality touch-less faucet so I bought my K-72218-CP faucet at Amazon. It worked great for 11 1/2 months, then the touch-less feature stopped working. The first replacement part Kohler recommended (valve box cover assembly) I try is about $50. Kolher says it might fix it or maybe another part might. Other 1-star reviews on this product also report problems with the control board (valve box cover assembly) and solenoid. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Apeman

customer_reviews.title: ... faucet 5 stars - it was expensive but a great experience. Then after just a few months I ...
customer_reviews.text: I originally gave this Kohler faucet 5 stars - it was expensive but a great experience. Then after just a few months I lost almost all the water pressure. Now I read other reviews indicating that it has a bad solenoid that needs to be replaced - hopefully with an improved replacement part? So I'm ordering my part now and hope it solves the problem. For a premium priced product this is unacceptable. $600 for the faucet and now buy a replacement part AND pay someone to install it?! Kohler clearly did not test this product enough before introducing it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s not as sturdy as it looks -if you cook it’s not for you
customer_reviews.text: I love kohler brand faucets and my last kitchen faucet was kohler. It lasted over 11 years (and we cook at home 3-4 times a day) This faucet i bought on amazon is very cheaply made and does not match the quality and standard we are used to from this brand. It will not last if you actually use your kitchen to cook. If you rarely cook or only need a faucet to wash hands or the daily coffee mug... this will work for you. Also, if you return it beware of the 20% restocking fee. :( sooooooo disappointed in the quality of this faucet...
customer_reviews.author: Albert schweitzer

customer_reviews.title: Very dependable and habit forming
customer_reviews.text: We moved off and left our first Kohler touchless. We loved it. Is a bit of extra work to install and need to locate parts so that the extension and weights don't hit the Kohler brain. We sometimes wave at our other faucets to turn them on or off. Doesn't work, and makes you feel real foolish. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: RRC

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to install, but after works great
customer_reviews.text: Love the functionality. Competing products are likely easier to install. Some connections have very short hoses and require components to be mounted very close by faucet, make sure you have space under your sink (map out control box installation before starting process).
customer_reviews.author: C. S. Herrera

customer_reviews.title: A thing of beauty
customer_reviews.text: After researching online many touchless faucets, I was becoming disheartened about buying one until I found the Sensate Touchless Kitchen Faucet. It has exceeded my expectations. Simple install. It is AC powered. Of the many complaints about other touchless faucets was the fact that the batteries needed to be changed out often. When purchasing, just be sure to have an outlet to plug in the system under the sink. Because of the "touchless operation," preparing foods is more hygienic. I highly recommend this faucet.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this faucet! We’ve had it for three months now. My husband installed it easily and it works nicely without touching it. Turns off after a few minutes by itself. The sprayer really kick’s out the water so I usually just use it to rinse down my sink. I definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Cricket

customer_reviews.title: My kitchen sink area stays clean and I love how easy it is to use
customer_reviews.text: How did I EVER live without this way too expensive faucet, but so worth every penny. My kitchen sink area stays clean and I love how easy it is to use.
customer_reviews.author: J. Corbett

customer_reviews.title: Koehler was useless!
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this product! It worked for about 12 months and now I can only have hot or cold water, not both! Koehler was useless!
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Amazing faucet!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing faucet by Kohler! Great performance beautiful looks. Very happy with my buy!
customer_reviews.author: Veronika Astapenko

customer_reviews.title: Really like this faucet alot
customer_reviews.text: Really like this faucet alot. Works properly and met with my expectations. Pricing was also more competitive than my local appliance store.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Weinstein

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous and super handy!
customer_reviews.text: This faucet is beautiful and looks great in my kitchen. I absolutely love the touchless feature! The removable spray handle works great to clean my large sink.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is the best kitchen faucet I have ever owned!
customer_reviews.author: B E Wakely-Folmer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Amazing to have your hands free but will drive your guests crazy. I love it. Great styling as well.
customer_reviews.author: Smart Consumer

customer_reviews.title: This faucet is exactly what I hoped it would be.
customer_reviews.text: Kohler rarely disappoints. This faucet is gorgeous! So easy to use. Practical. A work of art in the kitchen. My husband was able to install it, and he's not a plumber, just very handy. I'd recommend it to anyone, who'd like something special in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Olaf A.

customer_reviews.title: Daily use for 5 yrs
customer_reviews.text: This faucet has been an excellent 'tool' in our kitchen for over 5 yrs with no problems. The plumber said it was a 'normal' installation, and its performance for us has been exemplary - consistent, easy to use, very easy to keep clean in the VS - vibrant stainless finish. Has the appearance of brushed stainless steel which looks very nice with most stainless steel sinks. We 'turn off' the sensor feature when we are not actively working in the kitchen. After all, you don't leave a faucet 'running' when you leave a room, do you? :) We are buying another one for our new home - can't imagine a kitchen without this faucet!
customer_reviews.author: T.B.

customer_reviews.title: Sensor stops working and it's a pain in the ass to fix it.
customer_reviews.text: Ready to deal with sensor related issues? This is the faucet for you. Get a regular faucet, save yourself the headache and lots of batteries. After about a year of owning this, I got sick of dealing with the battery issues and problems with the faucet shutting off on it's own. I'm now working on trying to uninstall the sensor to make it into a normal faucet. Save yourself the headaches and skip the fancy sensors.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Broken hose leaked inside unit and buckled hardwood floors
customer_reviews.text: Rarely write reviews but wanted to give others a heads up about this faucet. The hose leaked after two years of normal use (no kids at home anymore). The leak went up the faucet and under the floor boards. The floors are now buckled and will need repair - this is how we found out about the leak. Obviously unhappy with this product. We paid top dollar and this faucet should last longer than 2 years.
customer_reviews.author: DMCJ

product_meta.title: KOHLER K-72218-CP Sensate Touchless Kitchen Faucet,Polished Chrome
product_meta.description:
Style:Standard Touchless| Color:Polished ChromeTake touch-less to a whole new level of convenience. The Sensate touch-less faucet frees your hands so you can speed through cooking and cleanup tasks while enjoying a cleaner, more hygienic kitchen environment. Sensate's intuitive Response technology is in tune with your every move: a simple wave of your hand--or an object such as a pan or utensil-turns it on or off. The faucet's sensor is precision-designed to provide reliable operation every time and to prevent false activation when you're working in the sink area. DockNetik, KOHLER's new docking system, secures the pull-down spray head to the spout using magnetic force.

AMAZON.COM


view larger view larger view larger view larger view larger view larger CONVENIENCE IN TECHNOLOGY
The Response technology of the Sensate touchless kitchen faucet responds to your movements, leaving you to wonder how you ever prepped, cleaned and cooked without it. Tackling daily kitchen tasks often leaves your hands messy, full or even both. KOHLER has simplified and streamlined the kitchen faucet to make your time in the kitchen more efficient. Delivering convenient and hygienic control, this intuitive faucet reduces the threat of cross-contamination. Sensate has many convenient features such as an automatic shutoff safeguard to make cleanup easier. 

KEEP YOUR KITCHEN CLEANER
The Sensate kitchen faucet frees your hands so that you can flow through your kitchen tasks, like messy food prep, without pausing to turn the faucet handle on and off. And you don’t have to worry about spreading the mess and germs to the rest of the kitchen. 

The state-of-art sensor responds in 20 milliseconds. Simple wave your hand or a pot or pan through the sensor window for reliable on/off operation. The window begins at the underside of the spout and extends six inches toward the base. Simply wave your hand through the beam to activate the water. If you need to change the water temperature, simply adjust the handle while the faucet is in use. 

SPRAYHEAD FEATURES
Sensate features DockNetik, our new magnetic docking system that securely locks the sprayhead in place. With spray and stream capabilities, the dual-function sprayhead makes tough kitchen tasks light work. The braided nylon hose prevents kinks and tangles, and the swiveling ball joint ensures smooth operation with minimal effort. 

DESIGNED FOR BEAUTY AND POWER
The fusion of sleek design and workhorse functionality allows you to accomplish kitchen tasks more cleanly and easily. Sensate's signature aesthetic element is the black bonnet - an unexpected touch that adds a subtle detail to its design. A finished-matched bonnet is also available. The strategically placed activation area makes use precise and natural. An LED light near the base of the faucet alerts you that the Sensate is operational and ready to go. And in the event of a power loss, the faucet can be operated manually. 

KEY FEATURES
 * Touchless Operation: convenient and hygienic control with Response technology 
 * State-of-Art Sensor: responds to motion in 20 milliseconds
 * Battery-Free: AC power means no batteries to replace 
 * Secure Magnetic Docking: sprayhead securely locks in place 
 * Lasting Finish: resists corrosion and wear 
 * Durable Ceramic Valves: a lifetime of exceptional performance
 * Easy Clean: wipes clean with a wet cloth
 * Auto Shutoff: automatic shutoff safeguard
 * ProMotion Technology: connects the sprayhead hose to the sprayhead with a swivel joint for effortless maneuverability
 * MasterClean Sprayface: flexible nozzles for an easy-to-clean surface that resists mineral buildup and wipes clean with a wet cloth



FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Take touchless to a whole new level of convenience. The Sensate touchless faucet frees your hands so you can speed through cooking and cleanup tasks while enjoying a cleaner, more hygienic kitchen environment. Sensate's intuitive Response(TM) technology is in tune with your every move: a simple wave of your hand--or an object such as a pan or utensil--turns it on or off. The faucet's sensor is precision-designed to provide reliable operation every time and to prevent false activations when you're working in the sink area. DockNetik(TM), KOHLER's new docking system, secures the pull-down sprayhead to the spout using magnetic force.

See more
feature_bullets: Response technology provides reliable touchless on/off operation through a state-of-the-art sensor that responds in 20 milliseconds
Precision activation window helps prevent false activation. DockNetik, a magnetic docking system located within the spout, smoothly glides and securely locks the spray head into place.

DockNetik, a magnetic docking system located within the spout, smoothly glides and securely locks the sprayhead into place.Two-function pull-down sprayhead with touch-control allows you to switch from stream to Sweep spray

AC-powered operation : no batteries to replace.Sweep spray features specially angled nozzles that form a wide, powerful blade of water to sweep your dishes and sink clean. Pro-Motion technology :- with its light, quiet nylon hose and ball joint - makes the pull-down spray head easier and more comfortable to use
